node.text: ⚠️AMAZING KITTEN RESCUE!⚠️ During our recent trip to Greece, our friends @everchanginghorizon and @jess.wandering rescued the cutest little kitten that was abandoned on a cliffside and we were honored to also help after getting introduced to @zawf.zante.gr an incredible animal rescue charity that desperately needed more funding to help save more animals! Karmagawa cofounder @timothysykes donated 1,000 euros to them on the spot, but we have also created a fundraiser with the goal of raising $25,000 to get them a full on shelter and veterinarian on their staff because there are SO many more animals in Zakynthos that need URGENT help so please donate what you can, share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too and let’s all work together to raise the $25k ZAWF needs to help more animals in need! Sadly, this little kitten didn’t make it and that’s why we MUST get these poor animals more help faster in the future…we’ll link our @karmagawa Facebook fundraiser in our stories/highlights too and ALL donations on all platforms, great and small, are most appreciated! #helpanimals #savethekitties #zakynthos #animalrescue #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️HOW GREAT IS THIS ANIMAL RESCUE?!⚠️ Leo found this squirrel having a seizure while he was helping his mom in the garden and he quickly decided to help this poor creature in need. Even though the squirrel was unresponsive at first, Leo still wanted to help and as you watch this video, see how he and his sister successfully nursed this poor squirrel back to full health! How great is this?! Please share this heartwarming video with your followers and tag people who need some positivity in their day and let’s all thank Leo and his sister for their amazing animal rescue here as we should all get inspired to help animals in need! Great video @ladbible #saveanimals #animalrescue #helpanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES: PLEASE SHARE THIS AND SIGN THE PETITION TO STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE RIGHT NOW! ⚠️ Do you know the dark truth behind the cosmetic industry and the beauty products far too many unaware people use? How beautiful can someone feel if they knew that their beauty products caused unimaginable pain and torture to innocent animals?⁣⁠ The testing of baby pigs, beagles, rabbits, monkeys, rats and mice reveals deliberate cruelty…rabbits dying, monkeys screaming and dogs suffering accompanied by staff jokes as they are injected or forced to ingest or inhale substances to measure toxic effects, which can include vomiting, internal bleeding, respiratory problems, fever, organ failure and even death.⁠ This happens worldwide and spreading awareness is the key to stopping it so please share this sad post with your followers and tag people who need to see this. There’s also a petition in the @karmagawa highlights to close Vivotecnia Laboratory, one of the worst offenders...THIS MUST STOP NOW! Please share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see this too and sign the petition we’ve linked in our highlights as sadly more than 115 million animals suffer and die every year in laboratories like these — WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE RIGHT NOW!  Use your social media platform and share to speak up for these innocent animals that are being tortured! Eye-opening video by @thesavemovement  #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #endanimaltesting #stopanimaltesting #animalsdeservebetter #karmagawa

node.title: The Dark Truth Behind The Cosmetic Industry

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE THIS AMAZING VIDEO AND LET’S REMIND EVERYONE TO HELP ANIMALS IN NEED! ⚠️ This rescued baby chimp fell asleep in the lap of the pilot @anthonycaere while they flew to his new home…how cute is this?! Amazing work Anthony and @lwiro_primates stop, ok ease help us get the word out about this incredible story and these people who work hard to protect these beautiful animals by sharing this post and tagging people who need to see it as we MUST make this a better planet for humans and animals alike and spreading awareness is the key! Great video by @thedodo #animalrescue #savethebabies #animalsdeservebetter #stopthekilling #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING: PLEASE SHARE TO HELP STOP THIS REVOLTING ANIMAL CRUELTY! ⚠️ This is who really suffers for the exotic skins trade. This footage exposes how workers are trained to kill and skin crocodiles—all for “fashion” and WE MUST EACH DO OUR PART TO STOP THIS MADNESS RIGHT NOW! The fact that people still buy clothing and accessories made from animal skin like this is due to a lack of awareness of how terribly these animals are treated so please use your social media platform and share this URGENT video with your followers to help us educate everyone as WE MUST STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE ONCE AND FOR ALL! There’s plenty of other non-cruel materials that can be used to make clothing and accessories, especially sustainable/recycled fabrics like our own Karmagawa & @savethereef charity march (see link in our bio)…WE MUST GET THE FASHION INDUSTRY TO STOP ABUSING/ELECTROCUTING INNOCENT ANIMALS! Please share this sad video and tag people, celebrities, influencers & news media who need to see and share this too…no animal deserves to to be treated like this! Thanks for posting @peta #savethecrocodiles #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa

node.title: Why You Shouldn’t Buy Crocodile Skin Clothing/Accessories

node.text: ⚠️HOW AMAZING IS THIS ACT OF HUMAN KINDNESS?⚠️This cow had fallen down a slope and into the fast-moving water and would have drowned had it not been saved by several brave locals here. Please watch and share this incredible animal rescue video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it so they can share too & let’s all spread awareness about this important message of how we should ALL help animals in need like these kind people did for this cow that was nearly swept away by this canal! #teamwork #animalrescue #helpanimals #saveanimals #karmagawa

node.text: How heart-warming is the rescue of this 3-legged stray cat that spent nearly a decade outside in the cold? No wonder Bubby just wants to curl up by the fireplace now! Please watch/share this beautiful video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers who need to see it so they can share too because ALL ANIMALS DESERVE ALL THE HELP AND LOVE WE CAN GIVE THEM, PLEASE USE YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM TO HELP US SPREAD THIS IMPORTANT MESSAGE! Video by @thedodo @somebubbytolove #helpanimals #straycat #animalrescue #saveanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES, PLEASE SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS!⚠️12 years ago, the abuse of sloth bears was being sold to tourists as ‘entertainment’ in the streets of India. These ‘dancing bears’ were in constant agony as they pleased their ‘owners’ for the enjoyment of passers-by. With a rope threaded through a raw wound of their muzzle, they were pulled around to stand on their hind legs and shake in pain, giving the illusion of a ‘dance’. The bear in this video is named Raju, India's very last dancing bear. Thanks to @international_animal_rescue @wildlifesos and @freethebears more than 600 bears, including Raju were rescued and given a permanent home at one of the sanctuaries throughout India! The direct action of rescuing these bears was of course necessary in ending this 400+ year old tradition, but working with the bear handlers (known as the Kalandar people) with education and outreach programs was also vital as the Kalandar people who relied on the practice to feed their families were treated with dignity and were provided with alternate livelihoods through training schemes and grants. Many have now gone on to open their own businesses while others now work at the rescue centers. And for the first time Kalandar children were able to attend school and receive education sponsored by the project, in fact over 1000 children have now benefitted from this program. Please share this sad but ultimately uplifting post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers as together, we can all make a difference to the lives of suffering animals everywhere! Great video by @international_animal_rescue #animalrescue #savethebears #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️WARNING: GRAPHIC IMAGES, PLEASE SHARE TO HELP SAVE SHARKS!⚠️ Back in 2019, the Karmagawa crew traveled to South Africa with the extremely talented underwater photographers @andremusgrove and @jeff_panella and our partners at @representclo to bring greater awareness to the sharks of South Africa since these apex predators are being killed far too often and that’s de-stabilizing our planet’s marine ecosystem. For this @savethereef project we worked with the great charity @sharkconservancy and the awesome crew at @shark_explorers and we are proud to also support marine life charities like @sharkguardian in their important shark research and conservation efforts. Please watch and share this urgent video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it so we can make EVERYONE aware of how urgent this crisis has become as we MUST stop killing sharks and destroying the future of our oceans before it’s too late! #SouthAfrica #savethesharks #sharksarefriends #savethereef #karmagawa

node.title: Why We MUST Save Sharks Before It’s Too Late!

node.text: ⚠️SHARE THIS WITH SOMEONE SPECIAL IN YOUR LIFE!⚠️This is for anyone who needs a little reminder of how incredible animals are and the power of love/togetherness on this special day, Happy Valentine’s Day everyone! Share with your followers and tag someone who needs to see it too, great video by @thedodo #animallover #loveislove #valentines #happyvalentinesday #animallovers #karmagawa

⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND HELP US STOP THESE TOXIC FIRES!⚠️ The world’s biggest tire graveyard in Kuwait holds an estimated 20-40 million tires and sadly many of those tires are now on fire, as they have been in the past too. Tire fires are extremely difficult to put out and they create smoke that carries toxic chemicals, like carbon monoxide and sulfur oxides, resulting from the breakdown of rubber compounds. From respiratory ailments to cancer, these substances can have severe short- and long-term health effects and tires also release heavy metals and oil as they burn, which seep into the ground and water over time, polluting land and water. Given this tire graveyard’s proximate location to residential neighborhoods, the site poses a severe hazard to people’s health so last year, the Public Authority for Industry transferred the responsibility to the Environment Protection Agency (EPA), who were tasked to find a solution to the tire graves. After taking over, the Director General of the EPA pointed out that, “we will be able to deal with them all within a period of not more than a year,” AND YET NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE! Instead of burning tires, tires can be recycled into sub-layers for roads, playground flooring and fuel for the cement industry so please use your social media platform for good and share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too as we MUST work together to make this go viral so everyone will be aware about this URGENT ISSUE — WE MUST STOP THESE TOXIC FIRES IMMEDIATELY, OUR PLANET DESERVES BETTER! #saveourplanet #stopthis #tirepollution #recycletires #wemustdobetter #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING/SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND LET’S HELP GREECE RIGHT NOW!⚠️ Tens of thousands of animals have died while thousands of tourists and residents have been evacuated from towns and villages as devastating wildfires continue to rage across Greece. This hard-hit country is sadly ill-equipped to battle over 150 fires burning, which have destroyed community after community, amid one of the worst heatwaves the country has seen in 40 years, burning forestland, destroying homes and businesses. In one late night video, ferries evacuated 1,153 people from the seaside village and beaches on Evia, after approaching flames cut off all other means of escape…while sadly the animals there did not escape. Since Greece doesn’t have enough resources to battle all these fires, firefighters are working 20+ hour shifts and sleeping whenever they can so 216 firefighters and 44 firefighting vehicles from Germany will be sent to the affected areas, but Greece needs more help too so we must use our social media platforms to spread awareness about this URGENT crisis by sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see what’s happening here and share this post too and donate to our new @karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of funds raised will go towards to providing badly needed medical treatment, food, water and shelter for all the people and animals affected by these devastating fires. Join us in praying for ALL living creatures in these areas and let’s work together to save as many lives as possible! #helpgreece #savelives #prayforgreece #saveanimals #wildfires #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND LET’S HELP GREECE AND TURKEY!⚠️ We are calling on EVERYONE to help Greece and Turkey in their time of need because while these countries are being ravaged by wildfires, they are sadly ill-equipped to put them all out and save people/animals in time so the international community MUST HELP THEM RIGHT NOW! In the past 3 days, dozens of towns and villages in Greece have been evacuated as a protracted heatwave and strengthening winds fueled more than 150 wildfires and scientists say the destruction in just the last 72 hours exceeds 50% of the average area burnt in previous years! In Turkey, 8 people have died, tens of thousands have been evacuated and thousands of animals have perished and despite these wildfires burning 7x more land this year than any year in decades, this country has NO firefighting planes, so we must send them help! You can help by using your social media platform to spread awareness about this by sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see and share this too and and donate to our new Karmagawa fundraiser where 100% of funds raised will go towards to providing medical treatment, food, water and shelter for all the people and animals affected by these devastating fires. We MUST all come to the aid of Greece and Turkey right now as this sadly record-breaking heatwave is forecast to continue for several days more so please share this post, donate and let’s all work together to help these hard-hit countries RIGHT NOW! #helpgreece #helpturkey #prayforturkey #prayforgreece #wildfire #letshelpeachother #karmagawa

A minister said:"We are no longer talking about climate change Ûu” a climate threat. @5.36am'.

Photo by Karmagawa on August 05, 2021. May be an image of tree and text that says 'Help Turkey GLOBAL CALL We are in need of fire planes and assistance to put a stop to the forest fires raging across more than 60 locations on the beautiful turquoise coast and mountains.'.

node.text: ⚠️SAD NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND LET’S SAVE OUR PLANET BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE!⚠️ Wildfires have erupted around the world; the most devastating the past few days in Turkey, but also Italy, USA, Spain, Russia, France, Cyprus, Finland, Lebanon, Canada & Greece have also had terrible fires! There has also been severe flooding in Germany, China, Italy, Belgium & Netherlands and now hail bigger than tennis balls has rained down in northern Italy…and it’s even snowed in Brazil! The second largest river in South America, Paraná River, is currently suffering from a severe drought, and we’ve seen tornadoes in the Czech Republic. The death toll from all these events is rising fast and more and more people are being evacuated and displaced from their homes as sadly these are all consequences of the irresponsible way we treat our one and only planet…WE MUST CHANGE OUR WAYS BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE! Please share this post with your followers, use your social media platform to spread awareness about this, tag your friends, celebrities, influencers, help us get the word out RIGHT NOW! PS we’ve had countless messages from our wonderful Turkish followers asking to share this and to all of them, our thoughts and prayers are with you, your families and your friends and we’re going to do everything possible to get the word out and get you more international aid! Thx @earthfocus #helpturkey #prayforturkey #helptheplanet #savetheplanet #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND JOIN US IN PRAYING FOR TURKEY!⚠️ Nearly 60 raging wildfires have broken out in Southern Turkey as temperatures have soared and strong winds stoked the flames the past 2 days, killing at least 4 people along with 1,000+ farm animals and sending 60 more people to the hospital as their homes burned down. So far 18 villages have been evacuated and 35 aircrafts, 457 vehicles, and 4,000 personnel have been involved in the firefighting efforts, as separate wildfires raged in the provinces of Osmaniye, Kayseri, Kocaeli, Adana, Mersin and Kutahya. Turkey has battled a series of disasters caused by extreme weather conditions this summer, including flash floods last week that killed 6 people in the Black Sea region so please join us in praying for all the people and animals in these hard hit communities along with the brave firefighters and share this with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too as we need as many prayers as possible right now! #prayforturkey #wildfire #wildfires #staysafeeveryone #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS TO STOP THIS, ANIMALS DESERVE FAR BETTER!⚠️ At an equestrian center in Murcia, Spain, summer classes are being offered to children with various craft activities, one of which is painting a horse. THIS IS WRONG ON SO MANY LEVELS — horses are NOT objects to be used by humans and animals should NOT be used for entertainment! WE MUST STOP forcing innocent animals to be treated like this and instead learn to respect these beautiful creatures much more! On top of that, we must teach our children that animals deserve our love, compassion and respect, not that they can be used as objects to be painted on. Please use your social media platform for good and share this sad video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers news media who need to see and share this too as we must make EVERYONE aware that no animal deserves to be treated like this and our children must be taught better values in life! #stopanimalcruelty #endanimalcruelty #animalsdeservebetter #horsesarelife #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️HOW GREAT IS THIS ANIMAL RESCUE?⚠️ Firefighters in Romania were called to rescue a 51-year-old man and his dog caught in a fire and while the injured man was taken to the hospital, this poor dog lay motionless on the sidewalk, unable to breathe due to too much smoke inhalation. That’s when these amazing firefighters began performing their life saving techniques, even performing mouth-to-mouth resuscitation! And after a number of chest compressions, the dog was ready for an oxygen mask and he began breathing on his again…later he was taken to a veterinary clinic for check up. WOW…HOW AMAZING IS THIS RESCUE? Please donate to our new Karmagawa fundraiser to support more great animal rescuers like this and also share this beautiful video with your followers and tag people who need some positivity in their day and let’s all thank these amazing firefighters for their incredible work in saving this dog! Join us by using your social media profile for good and sharing this video with your followers to remind EVERYONE that we should all help animals in need! #saveanimals #animalrescue #helpanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️URGENT ISSUE, PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR NEW FUNDRAISER TO HELP RESCUE MORE ANIMALS! ⚠️Repost from our friend/dog rescuer @ms.mojorising_ who says: I’m posting this again because it’s too severe of an issue not to. Not only is it a severe issue in El Paso….but it has become the norm. This heartbreaking scene is what happens day in and day out here. All those dogs y’all see me move out of state is for this exact reason, because heartless people don’t think or care. They didn’t measure the responsibility that being a pet owner requires and instead of taking responsibility/reaching out for help from a rescue they opt to dump their poor dog. I am disgusted, I am furious, and I am heartbroken. El Paso needs to DO BETTER! The person recording this video is a fellow dog rescuer and after recording she called El Paso Sheriffs Department, was given a case number, and secured the husky. The last time I was updated, the husky is safe at the sheriff’s department and will be taken in by Huckleberry Hound Dog Rescue of El Paso. TOO MANY DOGS ARE NOT AS LUCKY TO BE RESCUED SO WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO TREAT ANIMALS BETTER! Please donate to our new Karmagawa fundraiser linked on this post to help Esmerelda and other incredible rescuers save more animals in need and whether you do or don’t donate you can also help by sharing this post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share it too as we must all use our social media platforms to remind everyone to take better care of their pets, do NOT just leave them on the side of the road like this…THIS IS VERY CRUEL! #savethedogs #stopanimalcruelty #endanimalcruelty #petsarefamily #karmagawa

⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AS MARINE LIFE DESERVES BETTER!⚠️ Repost from @savethereef A red tide has invaded the Gulf Coast of Florida, already killing more than 613 tons of marine life and fish in and around Tampa as of the past week, according to local officials. Scientists feared a large bloom was imminent after polluted wastewater from an abandoned phosphate mine at Piney Point was recently pumped into Tampa Bay to stop a leak from flooding surrounding neighborhoods and the elevated concentrations of nitrogen and phosphorus are known to fuel phytoplankton growth which can lead to a potentially toxic algal bloom. Recently, @paulcuffaro documented this tragedy, saying “EVERYTHING was dead, from bait fish to baby manatees. The red tide is a sudden overgrowth of Karenia brevis, rust-colored algae that secrete a deadly toxin, but over the years it’s progressed. This type of outcome most definitely could’ve been prevented. This is not a natural occurrence it’s negligence from the people in power.” PLEASE USE YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM FOR GOOD AND SHARE THIS SAD NEWS WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS AND TAG PEOPLE, CELEBRITIES, INFLUENCERS AND MEDIA THAT NEED TO SEE AND SHARE THIS TOO!! We need to make change TOGETHER and the only way is to speak up for the voiceless #redtide #karmagawa #marinelifematters #animalsdeservebetter #savethereef

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING: PLEASE SHARE AND HELP US REMIND EVERYONE TO TAKE THESE FLOODS SERIOUSLY!⚠️ The death toll from the floods has risen to at least 205 across Europe, while a total of 176 people are still missing and now in China, 33 people have died with dozens missing even as the record-breaking rainfall continues and as authorities ramp up rescue and recovery efforts following devastating floods that caused submerged buildings, cars and even entire neighborhoods, trapped passengers in subway cars, caused landslides and overwhelmed dams and rivers. Join us in thanking the tens of thousands of brave police, firemen, good samaritans and emergency and rescue workers who have been working nonstop while risking their own lives to save people, and animals, in need. And while we continue to ask for as many prayers as possible for all those in these hard hit areas, please also use your social media platform for good and share this post wth your followers and tag people who need to see it to remind people not to underestimate these floods and to take the proper precautions to be safe — we’re seeing far too many videos of people not realizing the sheer power and force of these floods, thus endangering themselves and others around them too, SO SHARE THIS TO HELP MAKE EVERYONE AWARE OF HOW DANGEROUS THESE FLOODS ARE AND TO STAY AS SAFE AS POSSIBLE! #flashflood #flooding #climatechange #praying #prayforchina #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS: PLEASE JOIN US IN PRAYING FOR EVERYONE IN THESE HARD HIT AREAS!⚠️ We need as many prayers as possible right now because in the last few days, over 200 people have died due to severe flash flooding in Germany, Belgium, Austria, Switzerland, Luxembourg and parts of the Netherlands with hundreds more missing and nearly 1,000 injured as Europe is suffering the worst flooding devastation in several decades. And now today, at least 12 people have died in the city of Zhengzhou, China due to record-breaking rainfall and catastrophic flooding, and more than 100,000 people have been forced to flee to seek safety. Many factors contribute to flooding, but a warming atmosphere caused by climate change makes extreme rainfall more likely so we MUST TREAT OUR PLANET BETTER BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE! Please share this post with your followers and tag people who need to see it as heavy rain is forecast to continue and we must use our social media platforms to thank all the rescue workers of their brave efforts, to pray for more survivors and make sure everyone takes the proper precautions to stay safe! #flashflood #flooding #climatechange #prayforbelgium #prayforgermany #prayforchina #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS TO HELP END ANIMAL CRUELTY!⚠️ This video of a poor elephant in Myanmar pulling a heavy truck filled with logs chopped down from a forest has gone viral on social media because it exemplifies two urgent issues we MUST confront right now: ending both animal cruelty and deforestation! This exact kind of heartbreaking scene plays out worldwide as far too many animals are treated terribly with very little food or water and forced to perform exhausting manual labor in harsh conditions, often forced to help destroy their homes like this poor elephant is doing. WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS UGLY CYCLES RIGHT NOW! Please use your social media platform for good and share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it and share it too as we MUST all remind EVERYONE that we MUST save our forests and stop animal cruelty like this…our planet and our wildlife, especially endangered animals like this, deserve SO MUCH BETTER! Thanks for sharing @sahabatsurga #stopanimalcruelty #endanimalcruelty #animalsdeservebetter #savetheelephants #karmagawa
